price: 27. (Fircoon) wuxuu yidhi3: Hubaal Rasuulkiinna la idiin soo diray waa jinnoole.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
footnotes: 3. Isagoo si ay cadho badan ku jirto ula hadlaya dadkii goob joogga ahaa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
